changes.raw_text: Tactical Jump now stuns and puts the Battlecruiser into a 1 second vulnerability phase before it teleports; in this state it can be damaged and Tactical Jump may not be canceled.
Yamato Cannon will no longer cancel itself if a target enters a transport or becomes cloaked/burrowed; instead, the shot will miss and the ability will go on cooldown.
Infernal Pre-Igniter research cost decreased from 150/150 to 100/100.
Infernal Pre-Igniter research cost decreased from 150/150 to 100/100.
Advanced Ballistics upgrade moved from the Starport Tech Lab to the Fusion Core.
Advanced Ballistics now increases Defender Mode range by +3 (down from +4).
Rapid Re-Ignition System upgrade moved from the Starport Tech Lab to the Fusion Core.
Rapid Re-Ignition System now also increases Medivac base movement speed from 3.5 to 4.13 (does not affect speed during Ignite Afterburners).
Now always attempts to spawn on the side of mineral patches closest to a town hall.
Interference Matrix energy cost increased from 50 to 75.
Interference Matrix duration increased from 8 seconds to 11 seconds.
Movement speed increased from 3.85 to 4.13.
High Impact Payload damage decreased from 40 (+15 vs Massive) to 25 (+10 vs Massive).
High Impact Payload weapon cooldown decreased from 1.7 to 0.9.
Broodling leash range decreased from 12 to 9.
Active Creep Tumors may no longer be canceled.
Removed the Infested Terran ability.

New ability: Microbial Shroud (requires Evolve Microbial Shroud at the Infestation Pit: Hive, 150/150, 79s). Creates a shroud that obscures ground units below, reducing the damage they take from air units by 50% for 11 seconds. Energy cost: 100. Cast range: 9. Radius: 3.
Neural Parasite range decreased from 9 to 8.
Neural Parasite can no longer target Heroic units.
Lurker Den build time decreased from 86 seconds to 57 seconds.
Base attack range decreased from 9 to 8.
New upgrade at the Lurker Den: Seismic Spines (Hive, 150/150, 57s), increasing Lurker range from 8 to 10.
Adaptive Talons research duration increased from 54 seconds to 57 seconds.
Lurkers affected by Blinding Cloud will now only fire to melee range.
Nydus Worm cost increased from 50/50 to 75/75.
Summon Nydus Worm ability cooldown increased from 0 to 14.
Nydus Network and Nydus Worm initial unload delay increased from 0.18 to 0.36.
Nydus Network and Nydus Worm load period increased from 0.09 to 0.18.
Nydus Network and Nydus Worm unload period increased from 0.18 to 0.36.
Pneumatized Carapace research cost increased from 75/75 to 100/100.
Resonating Glaives reworked: instead of permanently increasing attack speed by 45%, it now increases attack speed by 60% for 6 seconds after a completed Psionic Transfer.
Time Warp now affects air units in addition to ground units and buildings.
Time Warp delay reduced from 3.57 seconds to 1.79 seconds.
Gains the Heroic tag (cannot be targeted by Neural Parasite).
Base movement speed decreased from 3.01 to 2.63.
Gravitic Boosters upgrade movement speed bonus reduced from +1.51 to +1.31.
Kinetic Overload (anti-air) range decreased from 15 to 14.
Health increased from 150 to 200.
Shields decreased from 125 to 100.

New upgrade at the Fleet Beacon: Flux Vanes (100/100, 57s) increasing movement speed from 3.5 to 4.65 and acceleration from 2.8 to 3.76; Prismatic Alignment still reduces movement speed to 2.625 after the upgrade.
Charge upgrade no longer provides +8 damage on impact.
Charge upgrade now increases Zealot movement speed from 3.15 to 4.72 (up from 4.13).
New map mechanic: Increases movement speed of ground and air units within the generated field by 35%.
Center of the Acceleration Zone Generator is now pathable.
Center of the Inhibitor Zone Generator is now pathable.
